column1: Welcome! I made this lil' sheet so I could have an easy way to look at encounter rates and available pokemon in each game! I manually compiled all the data from Bulbapedia. So if there are any errors, typos (or any other general suggestions), let me know!

column3: Looking for a specific pokemon? Use the search sheet to automatically pull up locations
A basic overview of the availability of each pokemon in each game.
A more detailed look into each pokemon's availability. Recommended that you set your view size to 80% or 90%, this sheet contains a lot of information.
Due to the sheer redundancy of fishing encounters, they have been separated into their own sheet.

column2: Can be directly obtained within the game through wild encounter
Special Encounters / Gift Pokemon (Starters, Legendaries, Fossils, Eggs, etc.)
Can only obtain pokemon by evolving or breeding pokemon that are already available by the above methods.

Currently Unobtainable - Was once obtainable through special events and limited distributions. 

Depending on the generation and distribution method, pokemon in this category may still be obtainable through certain workarounds / glitches.
Requires at least an Old Rod to obtain
Requires at least a Good Rod to obtain
Requires a Super Rod to obtain
